nodes.text: The obelisk was an ancient Sith artifact, dating back to sometime prior to 38,000 BBY. Housed on the planet of Krayiss Two, the obelisk was used as the gateway for accessing a—likewise age-old—Sith library-temple. It was encountered by the Jedi Knight Vara Nreem when she arrived on Krayiss Two in an attempt to communicate with the Sith.
